pr_title: fix(TDI-31777) : warning with special csv files

timeline.message: fix(TDI-31777) : warning with special csv files

timeline.bodyText: No warning if lineEnd is empty ?
timeline.author: ypiel-talend

replies.bodyText: So the warning message is not relevent if empty line end...
replies.author: ypiel-talend

timeline.author: ypiel-talend

timeline.bodyText: NoneRFC or NotRFC but Non is french word
timeline.author: ypiel-talend

replies.bodyText:
it can be english, like non-operating-incomes , non-english country  ....
dictionnary https://dictionary.cambridge.org/dictionary/english/non ;)
replies.author: clesaec

timeline.author: ypiel-talend

replies.bodyText: this was the point of orginal text of the JIRA. But, after reading RFC and realize that this demand is far from it, we decided to just put a warning.
replies.author: clesaec

replies.bodyText: I was talking about "ignore" that should be "ignored"
replies.author: ypiel-talend

replies.bodyText: Corrected (always have difficulties with this mix of future (will), and past (ed termination)) ;)
replies.author: clesaec

timeline.author: ypiel-talend
